pullrequest.title: Support off-diagonal inertia terms in bullet

content.raw: hm...I think adding another private field to `BulletLink` breaks ABI since we haven't made a Private data class for `BulletLink` yet and this PR targets gazebo7. Using the `sdf` object for data storage isn't ideal either, since it involves lots of string manipulation. We could forward-port this portion of the fix to default so ABI changes are ok
content.html: hm...I think adding another private field to BulletLink breaks ABI since we haven't made a Private data class for BulletLink yet and this PR targets gazebo7. Using the sdf object for data storage isn't ideal either, since it involves lots of string manipulation. We could forward-port this portion of the fix to default so ABI changes are ok
